title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
notable_quotes: The rich don't work for money. They make money work for them.

author_philosophy: Promote disciplined, value-driven investing to avoid speculative risks.
reviews: The best book on investing ever written. - Warren Buffett

author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

author_philosophy: Encourage critical thinking by understanding the dual systems of thought and the biases they introduce.
